title: Acceptance of Terms
description: By accessing and using our job search website, you agree to abide by these Terms and Conditions. If you do not agree with any part of these terms, please refrain from using the site.

title: User Eligibility
description: Users must be at least 18 years old to access our services. By using the website, you confirm that you are of legal age.

title: Account Responsibility
description: Users are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of their account information, including usernames and passwords. Any activity that occurs under your account is your responsibility.

title: Job Postings
description: Job postings on our website are subject to approval. We reserve the right to reject or remove any job posting that violates our guidelines or is deemed inappropriate.

title: User Content
description: Users may submit resumes, profiles, and other content. By doing so, you grant us the right to display and share this information with potential employers.

title: Privacy Policy
description: Our Privacy Policy outlines how we collect, use, and share user information. By using the website, you agree to the terms outlined in our Privacy Policy.

title: Job Applications
description: Users understand that submitting applications through our website does not guarantee employment. Employers have the sole discretion to evaluate and select candidates.

title: Prohibited Activities
description: Users agree not to engage in activities that could harm the website or interfere with its functionality. This includes but is not limited to hacking, data mining, or any unauthorized access.

title: Intellectual Property
description: All content on the website, including logos, text, and graphics, is the property of the website owner. Users may not reproduce, distribute, or use this content without permission.

title: Termination of Services
description: We reserve the right to terminate or suspend services at our discretion. Users violating these Terms and Conditions may face account suspension or termination.

title: Changes to Terms
description: We reserve the right to modify these Terms and Conditions at any time. Users will be notified of changes, and continued use of the website implies acceptance of the updated terms.

title: Disclaimer of Warranties
description: We provide the website on an "as is" basis. We do not guarantee the accuracy, completeness, or reliability of the information on the site.

title: Limitation of Liability
description: We are not liable for any direct, indirect, or consequential damages arising from the use or inability to use our website.

title: Governing Law
description: These Terms and Conditions are governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the Federal Republic of Nigeria. By using our job search website, you agree to these Terms and Conditions. If you have any questions or concerns, please contact us at [+8976546433].
